content.body: I am fairly certain ESM in Node.js just isn’t optimized enough because [even require(esm) was 1.2x faster than import esm when it came out](https://github.com/nodejs/node/pull/51977#issuecomment-1995209126) 🤷‍♀️
content.formatted_body: I am fairly certain ESM in Node.js just isn’t optimized enough because even require(esm) was 1.2x faster than import esm when it came out 🤷‍♀️
